meanings.sent1: I bought a beautiful lithograph of a sunset for my living room.
meanings.sent2: The art gallery had a collection of lithographs by famous artists.
meanings.sent3: The lithograph of a dancing cat brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a lithograph etched in my memory, clear and lasting.
meanings.sent5: The lithograph of the mountain scene was so detailed, it felt like I could step into it.

meanings.sent1: The artist will lithograph his latest painting to create limited edition prints.
meanings.sent2: She learned how to lithograph her sketches onto special paper in art class.
meanings.sent3: I will lithograph your portrait and turn it into a masterpiece!
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to lithograph themselves in my mind, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The photographer will lithograph the stunning landscape to preserve its beauty forever.
